com.nalinstudios.iscan.graphics

Class ImgHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nalinstudios.iscan.graphics.ImgHelper

  • class ImgHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    A helper class that contains internal functions while processing images using the ImageProcessor Class.
    Author:
    Nalin Angrish.

    • Method Detail

      • findLargestSquare

        static int findLargestSquare(java.util.List<org.opencv.core.MatOfPoint> squares)
        A function to find the largest figure from the given figures. Used because most probably the largest Square in the images would be the page of the document to be scanned.
        Parameters:
        squares - The list of MatOfPoint objects which are the squares detected by the ImageProcessor class.
        Returns:
        The index of the largest square from teh given list.

      • getSpacePointToPoint

        static double getSpacePointToPoint(org.opencv.core.Point p1,
                                   org.opencv.core.Point p2)
        A function to get the space between two points.
        Parameters:
        p1 - Point 1
        p2 - Point 2
        Returns:
        The space between the two points.

      • sortCorners

        static void sortCorners(java.util.List<org.opencv.core.Point> corners)
        A function to sort the corners from a list of points
        Parameters:
        corners - The list of points to be sorted.
